about_the_game:
Embark on a whimsical adventure in the Only Way is Down a charming 3D platforming game that puts you in the paws of a kitty cat with an unexpected journey home. You take control of a feline explorer who, after an accidental catnap on some construction materials, finds themselves at the top of a towering skyscraper under construction. Now, it's up to you to find your way through a maze of precarious platforms, daring leaps, and navigate nerve shattering pathways to make your way back down to the cozy comforts of home.



🐾 Purr-fectly Crafted Cityscape: Explore a vertical playground in the heart of a bustling metropolis. From steel beams and scaffolding to cranes and half-finished floors, each area presents a unique challenge that will test your platforming prowess.



🎩 Customise Kitty: Give your kitty their own unique style with a wide range of kitty options and clothes! Pick your cat type, eye colour and chonkiness and unlock and mix-and-match customisable hats, glasses, masks, and other accessories to create a look that’s all your own.



🏗️ Kitty Cat World: Use the construction site elements to your advantage like only a lil kitty cat can. Climb on beams, leap over dangerous drops, swing on cranes, and navigate through the ever-evolving landscape.



😺 Feline Agility: Take control of this lost lil kitty cat and use their agile movement and feline reflexes to gracefully navigate through tight spaces, make daring jumps and gracefully land on narrow surfaces. It's all about finesse and precision!



🏙️ Dazzling Skyline: Immerse yourself in a vibrant and seemingly endless cityscape as you descend. Watch the city blend into the horizon and marvel at the stunning views that unfold as you make your way down the towering skyscrapers.



Set out on a paw-some journey with this lil kitty cat and experience the thrill of descending skyscrapers in this feline-filled adventure. Only Way is Down is not just a game; it's a heartwarming escapade that will leave you purring for more! Are you ready to take the plunge and find your way back home.

name: Only Way is Down

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 | AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a purr-fectly perilous adventure as this lil kitty cat took an unfortunate cat-nap and ended up stranded sky high! With no way but down, unleash your feline agility and platforming prowess to navigate your descent through the urban jungle in this whimsical and gravity-defying escapade!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Romanian, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
